header.title: Class 6 - Fire 3
authors: Esoteric School of Shamanism and Magic, 2003
header.category: Western Esotericism, Shamanism, Energy Healing, Magic

central_thesis: This document outlines practical techniques for manipulating 'fire energies' for self-healing and healing others, addressing various physical and energetic imbalances such as pain, anger, fevers, and localized injuries. The system emphasizes understanding natural body energy flows, proper grounding, utilizing specific color-banded fire energies, and employing particular hand movements and energetic constructs to clear blockages and restore balance.

structure_content.summary: This section introduces preparatory video clips focusing on 'Energy Circling with Fire and Air' and 'Pulling Fire Energy,' indicating a practical and visual learning component for the class.

This section details fundamental principles for working with fire energies: anything electrical carries fire energies; obtain permission before altering another's balances (unless endangering); respect normal body flows (top-to-bottom, back-to-front, head-to-extremities); associate pain, fever, and frustration with 'flame bands' (red-orange to yellow-orange); check with the client every 30 seconds due to fire energy's quick radiative movement; ground pulled energy instead of holding it; and utilize input/output hands for pulling/grounding, with flexibility for other body parts or hand reversal if needed.

This section provides specific operative instructions for treating various conditions: grounding is always the first step. For general tensions, angers, pain, and fevers, pull fire from feet, hands, or spine, respecting body flows. For localized pain, pull fire from below the area, identify stagnant 'hot spots' or 'ridges' by pushing energy, and switch color bands (red-orange, deep red) as needed. 'Sun yellow energy boxes' can 'smash' stubborn blockages. For headaches, address stagnant fire (flame bands, stagnant blood) by pulling, grounding on a refrigerator (for front headaches), or pulling through hands/feet/spine (for back headaches). Energy recircling involves pulling fire while pushing sky blue/white 'air' energy to transmute it. Bruised muscles require pulling yellow-orange then deep red for residual blockages. Burns/pinches involve rapidly spreading red-orange throughout the body, then grounding, then local pulling. Ulcers require pulling flame bands and pushing sky/water blue. Chest/stomach pain uses energy recircling with specific color pushes. Note is made that migraines, linked to 'bank issues,' cannot be fully cured by these methods.
This section presents a short ritualistic verse to conclude the class or practice: 'Sky Above and Earth Below Walking In Beauty I Greet You.'

key_concepts.definition: A fundamental energetic force carried by anything electrical, associated with pain, fever, and frustration. Its manipulation is central to the healing techniques.

The essential practice of discharging pulled or excess energy into the earth or a designated ground source (e.g., an electrical ground, a refrigerator) to prevent the practitioner from becoming drained or overloaded.

The natural energetic currents within the body, typically flowing top-to-bottom, back-to-front in the head and trunk, and from the head to the extremities. Healing techniques must respect these flows.
Specific color bands of fire energy, ranging from red-orange to yellow-orange, which are directly associated with the energetic signature of pain, fever, and frustration.
A localized area of stagnant or blocked fire energy, often causing pain. It can be detected by pushing a small amount of fire energy, which will be repelled back by the blockage.

A technique involving pulling out fire energy and simultaneously pushing in 'air' energy (sky blue or white) to transmute the fire and rebalance the energetic system, particularly useful for headaches and tired eyes.

Designated hands used for specific energetic functions: the input hand for pulling energy, and the output hand for grounding or flowing energy out. Their roles can be reversed if situational necessity demands it.
An energetic construct of sun yellow energy used to 'smash' or 'explode' stubborn blockages or old pains within the body, effectively breaking them apart for easier removal.

A term referring to deeper, buried unconscious issues, often spiritual or mind-based conflicts (e.g., suppressed fear, anger, grief), that manifest as severe physical conditions like migraines, and which are beyond the scope of simple energetic manipulation alone.

practical_system.description: The practical system is an operative method of energetic healing centered on the manipulation of 'fire energies' and other elemental energies (air, water) to resolve physical discomforts and energetic blockages. It involves using the practitioner's hands as conduits to 'pull' stagnant or excessive fire energy from an individual and 'ground' it away, or to 'push' specific color-banded energies (e.g., red-orange for pain, sun yellow for breaking blockages, sky/water blue for cooling/balancing). Key techniques include identifying 'hot spots' (energy blockages), respecting natural body energy flows (top-to-bottom, back-to-front), and obtaining consent from the subject. A unique 'energy recircling' technique allows for the transmutation of fire to air for specific balancing effects. The system is highly prescriptive, detailing specific colors, directions, and durations for various ailments.
tools: Color chips (for reference during energy work)
Refrigerator (as a large grounding source, particularly for front headaches)
Output hand (for grounding or flowing energy)
rituals: Exit Ritual: Sky Above and Earth Below Walking In Beauty I Greet You.

relevant_quotes.text: Anything that will carry electricity will carry fire energies, even psychic energies. (It's important to get an electrical ground).
The well trained practitioner does not hold the energy he or she pulls, but grounds it, and does not give energy from their own store except in an emergency.
Remember, the Universe doesn't care what you meant to do; it cares what you actually do.
If the fire energy is stuck, the fire energy you push with your hand will come back at you. We call this a “hot spot,” and it often feels like a “ridge” of energy.

Note that in the above procedure you are transmuting fire to air, even though we say that fire is not mutable. As magicians, we are alchemists and we are changing one element to another. By itself, fire will not change into another element.
The reason you can't get rid of the headache is because migraines are related to bank issues (buried unconscious issues of suppressed fear, anger and grief that are spirit to mind conflicts).
If and when the full force of a migraine headache were to enter the physical body, the person could incandesce.

critical_analysis.relevance: This document is highly relevant for practitioners engaged in energetic healing and elemental magic, particularly within a shamanic or occult framework. It provides a detailed, step-by-step methodology for manipulating 'fire energies' to alleviate a range of physical and energetic ailments. The system is presented as practical and operative, emphasizing hands-on application and immediate feedback. Its focus on grounding, respecting natural body flows, and the nuanced application of specific elemental colors (e.g., fire bands, sun yellow, water blue) demonstrates a sophisticated, mechanistic understanding of energetic anatomy. The inclusion of the concept of 'bank issues' and the transmutation of fire to air highlights a deeper, alchemical philosophical underpinning, suggesting that while elemental properties are generally fixed, a skilled 'magician' can effect change. This text bridges theoretical elemental knowledge with practical healing protocols.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience is primarily students and practitioners within the 'Esoteric School of Shamanism and Magic,' specifically those progressing through its elemental curriculum (Class 6 - Fire 3). It assumes prior knowledge of basic energy work, grounding, and elemental theory. Beyond this, it would appeal to any esoteric practitioner, energy healer, or occultist interested in practical applications of elemental magic, especially those seeking structured techniques for energetic manipulation and healing.
